summary.para: Provides a read-only object model for app packages.

remarks.para: The IAppxPackageReader interface provides the ability to access payload files from a package and to query metadata from footprint files.
This object can be retrieved using the method of the interface.
For an example, see Quickstart: Extract app package contents and Quickstart: Read app package manifest info.
